<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">
[Unblinking Flame Revelation](/Spells.aspx?ID=543)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 83 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

**Requirements** Your previous action was a successful unarmed Strike.
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Target** the creature you hit
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 2 rounds
</row>

</column>

---

You light your foe with revealing flame. The GM attempts a secret counteract check against each illusion affecting the creature; on a success, you suppress the illusion for the duration, rather than end the effect.
